project.title: Development analysis and feasibility study of aluminium alloy-air battery for powering electric vehicles
project.funding_agency: Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), Department of Science & Technology (DST), Government of India, under the Core Research Grant (CRG) scheme
project.principal_investigator: Dr. Ajay Biswas, Assistant Professor, Mechanical Engineering Department, NIT Agartala
project.duration: Initial appointment for 1 year, extendable up to 3 years based on performance

interview.how_to_apply: Submit a single PDF (<10 MB) containing application form, detailed CV, and scanned copies of all documents to ajaybiswasnita@gmail.com with subject 'JRF/PA application for SERB Project 2023'

terms_conditions: Positions purely temporary, governed by Research & Consultancy Cell, NIT Agartala
Candidates must ensure eligibility before applying
No TA/DA for interview or joining
Original degrees/certificates to be produced at the time of interview
Shortlisted candidates will be informed via email
Temporary engagement can be terminated without reason
Selected JRF may register for Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering subject to NIT Agartala Ph.D. rules 2018
